auth.audit_log_entries.name: audit_log_entries
auth.audit_log_entries.comment: Auth: Audit trail for user actions.

auth.identities.name: identities
auth.identities.comment: Auth: Stores identities associated to a user.

columns.name: email
columns.comment: Auth: Email is a generated column that references the optional email property in the identity_data

auth.instances.name: instances
auth.instances.comment: Auth: Manages users across multiple sites.

auth.mfa_amr_claims.name: mfa_amr_claims
auth.mfa_amr_claims.comment: auth: stores authenticator method reference claims for multi factor authentication

auth.mfa_challenges.name: mfa_challenges
auth.mfa_challenges.comment: auth: stores metadata about challenge requests made

auth.refresh_tokens.name: refresh_tokens
auth.refresh_tokens.comment: Auth: Store of tokens used to refresh JWT tokens once they expire.

auth.saml_providers.name: saml_providers
auth.saml_providers.comment: Auth: Manages SAML Identity Provider connections.

auth.saml_relay_states.name: saml_relay_states
auth.saml_relay_states.comment: Auth: Contains SAML Relay State information for each Service Provider initiated login.

auth.schema_migrations.name: schema_migrations
auth.schema_migrations.comment: Auth: Manages updates to the auth system.

auth.sessions.name: sessions
auth.sessions.comment: Auth: Stores session data associated to a user.

columns.name: not_after
columns.comment: Auth: Not after is a nullable column that contains a timestamp after which the session should be regarded as expired.

auth.sso_domains.name: sso_domains
auth.sso_domains.comment: Auth: Manages SSO email address domain mapping to an SSO Identity Provider.

auth.sso_providers.name: sso_providers
auth.sso_providers.comment: Auth: Manages SSO identity provider information; see saml_providers for SAML.

columns.name: resource_id
columns.comment: Auth: Uniquely identifies a SSO provider according to a user-chosen resource ID (case insensitive), useful in infrastructure as code.

auth.users.name: users
auth.users.comment: Auth: Stores user login data within a secure schema.

columns.name: is_sso_user
columns.comment: Auth: Set this column to true when the account comes from SSO. These accounts can have duplicate emails.

public.approval_routes.name: approval_routes
public.approval_routes.comment: Payment approval routes. One invoice type can have multiple routes.

columns.name: invoice_type_id
columns.comment: Invoice type ID this route applies to

columns.name: is_active
columns.comment: Whether this route is currently active

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the route was created

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the route was last updated

public.approval_steps.name: approval_steps
public.approval_steps.comment: Audit log of actions performed during payment approval process

columns.name: payment_approval_id
columns.comment: Payment approval ID this step belongs to

columns.name: action
columns.comment: Action taken: approved, rejected, or returned

columns.name: acted_by
columns.comment: User ID who performed the approval action

columns.name: acted_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the action was performed

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the record was created

public.attachments.name: attachments
public.attachments.comment: Metadata for files uploaded to Supabase Storage

columns.name: original_name
columns.comment: Original filename as uploaded by user

columns.name: storage_path
columns.comment: Path to file in Supabase Storage

columns.name: created_by
columns.comment: User ID who uploaded the file

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the file was uploaded

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when metadata was last updated

public.audit_log.name: audit_log
public.audit_log.comment: Centralized audit log for tracking changes to invoices, payments, and related entities

columns.name: entity_type
columns.comment: Type of entity: invoice, payment, invoice_attachment, payment_attachment, approval

columns.name: action
columns.comment: Action performed: create, update, delete, file_add, file_delete, status_change, approval_action

columns.name: field_name
columns.comment: Name of the field that was changed (for update actions)

columns.name: user_id
columns.comment: User ID who performed the action

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the action was performed

columns.name: metadata
columns.comment: Additional JSON metadata (file info, status names, comments)

columns.comment: Timestamp when the contractor was last updated

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the contract was created

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the contract was last updated

columns.name: created_by
columns.comment: User ID who created the contract

columns.name: project_id
columns.comment: Project ID this contract belongs to

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the department was created

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the department was last updated

columns.name: full_name
columns.default:
CASE
    WHEN ((middle_name IS NOT NULL) AND ((middle_name)::text <> ''::text)) THEN (((((last_name)::text || ' '::text) || (first_name)::text) || ' '::text) || (middle_name)::text)
    ELSE (((last_name)::text || ' '::text) || (first_name)::text)
END

columns.name: is_active
columns.comment: Whether the employee is currently active

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the employee was created

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the employee was last updated

columns.comment: User ID who created the employee record

columns.comment: Timestamp when the allocation was created

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the status was created

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the status was last updated

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the type was created

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the type was last updated

columns.comment: Supabase auth user who created the invoice

columns.comment: Timestamp when the invoice was last updated

columns.comment: Reference to contractor if sender_type = contractor

columns.name: recipient_type
columns.comment: Type of recipient: individual (.) or contractor ()

columns.name: recipient_contractor_id
columns.comment: Reference to contractor if recipient_type = contractor

columns.name: is_active
columns.comment: Whether the class is currently active

columns.name: created_at

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the class was last updated

columns.comment: Whether the material is currently active

columns.name: created_at

columns.comment: Timestamp when the material was last updated

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the item was created

columns.name: request_date
columns.comment: Date when the request was submitted

columns.name: created_by
columns.comment: User ID who created the request

columns.name: created_at

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the request was last updated
